description: The HSP_BKT_NAA_ADJ_HX table contains the history of a liability bucket that reflects how contractual adjustment write-offs were posted.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bucket record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the event that generated this history row. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Payment


User NRP the EOB


Expected Reimbursement Reevaluation


Undo Next Responsible Party


Claims Accept


Overridden Expected Reimbursement


Unbilled Accounts


Late Charge Accounts


Error Claims


Import Expected Reimbursement


Override Contract


Takeback


Next Responsible Party


System NRP the EOB


Not Allowed Amount Reversal


Payment Reversal


User Not Allowed Adjustment


Transfer to Self Pay


Demand Claim


Batch Expected Reimbursement Reevaluation


Claim Refresh


Batch Claims Refresh


Refund


Refund Reversal


Converted from Accelerated NRP History - Payment


Converted from Accelerated NRP History - User


Converted from Accelerated NRP History - XR


Converted from Accelerated NRP History - Undo NRP


Converted from Accelerated NRP History - Claims


Converted from XR History


Converted from XR History - Contract Override


Converted from XR History - XR Override


Converted from incorrect EOB information


Added in Error

columns.name: HLB_BILLED_AMT
columns.description: The bucket billed amount at the time of this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: CLAIM_BILLED_AMT
columns.description: The claim billed amount at the time of this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: PAYOR_BILLED_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the total payer-specified billed amount at the time of this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: EXPECT_ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: The expected reimbursement amount at the time of this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: PAYOR_ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the total payer-specified allowed amount at the time of this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: PAYOR_PAID_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the total payer paid amount at the time of this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: NONCVD_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the total payer non-covered amount at the time of this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: COPAY_AMT
columns.description: The total copay amount at the time of this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: COINSURANCE_AMT
columns.description: The total coinsurance amount at the time of this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: DEDUCTIBLE_AMT
columns.description: The total deductible amount at the time of this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: NOT_ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: The total not allowed amount posted on the bucket at the time of this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: ACTION_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the event in this contractual adjustment history row occurred.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user who is associated with this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: COMMENT_TEXT
columns.description: The comment entered by the user associated with this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: CONTRACT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the contract that was used when calculating the contractual in this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: CONTRACT_ID_CONTRACT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Vendor-Network contract.

columns.name: CONTRACT_EFF_DATE
columns.description: The effective date used by the contract for this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: INVOICE_NUM
columns.description: The invoice number that is associated with this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: PAYMENT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the payment transaction that was posted for this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: SECONDARY_NAA
columns.description: The not allowed amount associated with this contractual adjustment history row that is used by a secondary claim before a not allowed adjustment is posted.

columns.name: ACCEL_NRP_DONE_YN
columns.description:
This column stores whether accelerated next responsible party (NRP) was performed for this contractual adjustment history row.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: HNO_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the note that is associated with this contractual adjustment history row.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account to which the liability bucket is linked.

columns.name: MAX_POST_DATE
columns.description: The historical last post date allowed for charges used for expected reimbursement calculations. If no date is given, all charges were used regardless of post date. This is used when calculating expected reimbursement for unbilled charges on the prebilled bucket.
